column2: Show first run movies after there run has ended
column3: This theatre shows the first run movies after they have finished their run at the big chains and at a discounted rate no matter the time of the showing.The seating is open seating the chairs are the old style padded rocking chairs. If you want to save some coin there is a nearby 99 cent store for cheap snacks

column2: Cheap prices to see a movie
column3: You can go to this theatre and see a movie for a decent price. The movies are not the latest movies out and you don't have to pay a high price to see them.

column2: Throwback retro theater with cheap tickets
column3: You can come here for ticket prices between $1.50 and $3. Cheap tickets and relatively cheap concessions = a lot of people, and sometimes people that don't follow theater etiquette. You'll definitely enjoy the discount prices more if you come during non-peak times when it's not crowded. Parking is also scarce. Two ticket windows is a reason to arrive early or come during off times. Movies are still in theaters but not the most recent releases.
